alert.note: Alert for Labette; Neosho; Wilson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 12:57PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Wilson, northern Labette and Neosho Counties through 145 PM CDT... At 1256 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Thayer, or 12 miles east of Neodesha, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Parsons, Chanute, Erie, Altamont, St. Paul, Thayer, Galesburg, Labette, Earlton, Lake Parsons, Parsons Tri City Airport, Dennis, Big Hill Lake, Chanute Airport and South Mound. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 PM CDT for southeastern Kansas.
